name: Caro Racing
description:
Hello , I've made a simple endless runner game with very popular car in Poland - Polonez Caro. I hope you will have fun. Leave comment and share score!

**BE SURE YOU ARE NOT PLAY ON 100% VOLUME , IT IS A MEME BASED GAME**

KEY BINDINGS:

A/Left Arrow - Move Left

D/Right Arrow - Move Right

Credits:

Music: Skaner - Wakacyjny Romans (looped beat)

Polonez Caro  3D Model: https://skfb.ly/6RoKu
